title: The Legend of Heroes: Trails through Daybreak II - Complete Edition, v1.1.2 + 15 DLCs - FitGirl Repacks
repackFeatures: Based on The.Legend.of.Heroes.Trails.through.Daybreak.II-RUNE ISO release: rune-the.legend.of.heroes.trails.through.daybreak.ii.iso (22,115,024,896 bytes)
Game version: v1.1.2; 15 DLCs are included and activated
100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation (when installed in compressed/original mode)
NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded

This repack can be installed in either of two modes: in original compressed resources form and in uncompressed form. First mode will make your installed game identical to original release, but it’s using an official developers tool to create game archives. This tool operates in RAM only and on the largest file can eat almost 40 GB of RAM. So if you don’t have that much amount of RAM (virtual RAM is also counted) – you won’t be able to install the game properly. The second mode installs all files in uncompressed format – game works fine with it, but you won’t be able to install any possible patches on it. Also uncompressed mode is much faster in installation.

If you lack the physical RAM amount yet still want to install the game in original form, go to Windows virtual memory settings and make it static size of at least 64 GB. The installation with large virtual RAM will be extremely slow though.
Selective Download feature: you may skip downloading and installing of Japanese voiceovers/videos
Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 20.6 to 12.9/15.6 GB)
Installation takes from 5 minutes (on 32-threads CPU + SSD, uncompressed mode) up to 1.5 hours (on 4-threads CPU + HDD, compressed mode)
After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
HDD space after installation: up to 51.8 GB (in uncompressed mode)
Language can be changed in game settings
At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
